Detailed Description

Header file for ARP.c.

Define Documentation

#define ARP_OPERATION_REPLY   2

ARP header operation constant, indicating a reply from a host giving an address translation

#define ARP_OPERATION_REQUEST   1

ARP header operation constant, indicating a request from a host for an address translation

Function Documentation

int16_t ARP_ProcessARPPacket ( void *  InDataStart,
void *  OutDataStart 
)

Processes an ARP packet inside an Ethernet frame, and writes the appropriate response to the output Ethernet frame if the host is requesting the IP or MAC address of the virtual server device on the network.

Parameters:
[in] InDataStart Pointer to the start of the incoming packet's ARP header
[out] OutDataStart Pointer to the start of the outgoing packet's ARP header
Returns:
The number of bytes written to the out Ethernet frame if any, NO_RESPONSE otherwise
